titles.title: Immigration Employment Paperwork Reduction Act of 1987
A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to make use of the employment verification paperwork system voluntary.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

bill.summary: 12/3/1987--Introduced. Immigration Employment Paperwork Reduction Act of 1987 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to repeal certain employment verification recordkeeping requirements.
